@thisismelhai Hi Lhai. May we ask for your case number or chat session number please? It is included in email subject if you were able fill out our form. To maintain the confidentiality of your booking and for security purposes, please do not post any of your booking details here.

data.text: @twicehappy296 Hi saida! To help prevent the spread of COVID-19, most transactions that were previously processed in ticketing offices have moved online. We advise guests to simply process all requests through our website https://t.co/kPgrcWAGam.

@ThePaulisisimo For this case, please book child as adult first. Once booking is confirmed, just send us the booking reference, passenger's name and correct birth date so we can update the guest's details. Along with booking reference and name of adult companion thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi.

@ThePaulisisimo Hi ραบไιธιธι๓ο. You can no longer add another passenger to a confirmed booking. With this, you have to make a separate booking for the child but it cannot be done online as system will not allow booking of child passenger in a single record.
@vangeodee Hi Vangeo! Tel here. Sorry for this. May I ask if this was reported upon arrival? Thank you

@thisismelhai HI Lhai! Tel here. I will be glad to look into it. Can I have your case number so I could reach out to the case owner? Please monitor the email used in filing this case. Thanks for your patience!

data.text: @SeguiaJean I'm sorry to hear this experience Jean Beth. However, ancillary such as baggage, meal, seat, etc. cannot be removed/cancelled anymore once added to a booking whether it's paid or not.  No other manual or no human intervention was done on our end when ticket was managed online.
@lilmisskatniss We regret that you feel that way iris. Can I have your case number or chat session number so I could check with the agent?

data.text: @clen_david Hi 𝕂𝕦𝕪𝕒 ℂ𝕝𝕖𝕟. For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated. Or you may use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) then use Google Chrome browser if possible. Hope this helps.

@GalloJib Hi Jib! A Passenger may, within twenty-four (24) hours from the confirmation of the booking, make corrections on either his or her first name or last name. Such name correction may only be done once. Log in to your account at https://t.co/5TLfYWvFud and look for specific booking.

data.text: @miss___chelle I'm sorry to hear this mich. Please do the following troubleshooting & try again. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser if possible. For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated.
@jenmo_091392 Rest assured that case owner will be in touch with you as soon as we can Jen▪.
@jenmo_091392 Got this, we will endorse your correct email address to the case owner. Thank you.
@jenmo_091392 Got this Jen▪. As per checking, agent tried to send you an email today 11/17/2022 around 9:58 AM, however, email you have provided to her is undeliverable.
@jenmo_091392 We regret that you feel that way Jen▪. Can I have your case number or chat session number so we could ask the agent?
@MissTHerMajesty Hi Trizia . We are truly grateful to you for choosing us airline of choice. Have a great day ahead!
@emslagado I will be glad to look into it. Can I have your case number so I could reach out to the case owner? Please monitor the email used in filing this case. Thanks for your patience!

@emslagado If you have an urgent concern, you can request for live agent assistance. Our Live Chat team is available through Charlie the chatbot and is always ready to provide you with real time support round-the-clock.  Thank you!

@emslagado You can visit our Manage Booking online portal to easily access or update your booking. For helpful information on Frequently Asked Questions, you can get quick replies from Charlie the chatbot, he's online 24/7.

data.text: @emslagado Hi Ems! Tel here. We transitioned our customer service channels to support contactless processes for the safety of our passengers. We've also accelerated our digital efforts for quick and convenient self-service, anytime & anywhere.

@ArtheussWind Hi Artheuss! Extension cords are indeed not allowed in your hand carry for safety reasons. We only allow laptop chargers and/or phone chargers  in your hand carry baggage. Learn more here https://t.co/rfiF2XsjFi.

data.text: @iamzsara Hi Zsazsa! Travel requirements may vary depending on passenger's category and purpose of travel. To view the list of the updated guidelines please refer to these links: https://t.co/5glTT4YGnG / https://t.co/ZjYG3hWkLE. Thank you!

@_mleq Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, @_mleq. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@Asayswhuut Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, eyeknee. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@kc000000000000 We are sorry to hear your frustrations, kc. For us to check on the concern further, kindly send an email thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.

@itsnigelm Hi nigel! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@deeyoonjinhao Thank you for raising the concern, @deeyoonjinhao. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
